level.text: The Mayor shall make periodic evaluations of the operation and administration of the health benefit plans provided under § 1-621.05.
Each contract entered into under § 1-621.04 shall require the carrier to:
Furnish reasonable reports as the Mayor determines necessary to enable the District to carry out its functions under this subchapter; and
Permit the Mayor to examine records of the carriers as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this subchapter.

level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-27, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-621.02.
